projectName: Defi App X Dashboard - Dynamic Data & API Audit
description: Comprehensive audit to ensure all data is dynamic, APIs are functional, and real-time updates work correctly

issues: Opportunities section shows static timestamps ('10mins ago', '2 hours ago') that never update
Vitalik post and other content appears hardcoded
Data doesn't refresh or update dynamically
APIs may be returning mock data or not being called at all
problemStatement.rootCause: Components likely using hardcoded mock data instead of API calls or real-time data

phase1.name: API Endpoint Audit
tasks: Identify all API routes in /api directory
Test each API endpoint for functionality
Check if APIs return real or mock data
Verify API response structures

phase2.name: Dashboard Component Audit
tasks: Audit main dashboard page.tsx
Identify all components displaying dynamic data
Check if components fetch from APIs or use hardcoded data
Find all mock data objects and constants

phase3.name: Data Flow Audit
tasks: Trace data flow from API to UI
Identify components using useState with static initial values
Find useEffect hooks that should fetch data but don't
Check for missing data refresh logic

phase4.name: Timestamp & Real-time Audit
tasks: Find all timestamp displays
Check if timestamps are calculated dynamically
Identify polling/refresh mechanisms
Audit real-time update subscriptions

phase5.name: Fix Implementation
tasks: Replace hardcoded mock data with API calls
Implement proper data fetching with useEffect
Add refresh intervals for real-time data
Ensure timestamps update dynamically

expectedBehavior.timestamps: Should show relative time that updates (e.g., '5 minutes ago' should become '6 minutes ago')
expectedBehavior.opportunities: Should fetch from API and refresh periodically
expectedBehavior.analytics: Should show real or simulated real-time data
expectedBehavior.suggestions: Should generate new suggestions via API
